definition[0]: fairly or more than a little
example[0]: I’m pretty sure he’ll say yes.
explanation[0]: In written English, people usually avoid pretty and use fairly instead:
example[2]: The consequences of this are fairly obvious.
example[3]: Dinner at Luigi’s sounds pretty good to me.
definition[1]: a woman or child who is pretty has a nice attractive face
example[5]: Maria looks much prettier with her hair cut short.
definition[2]: something that is pretty is pleasant to look at or listen to but is not impressive
